entry.title: Payment Protocol Proposal: Invoices/Payments/Receipts
entry.summary: The ongoing debate between binary and text formats has been repeatedly discussed, leading to a call for an end to the argument. It is argued that there are no convincing reasons to use text over binary formats, as the latter offers several advantages. For those in favor of using JSON, it is suggested that they consider researching protocol buffers more thoroughly before making a final decision.
